title: Guy Mannering; or, The Astrologer - Complete
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Then he sought legal opinion, and wasadvised, by President Blair, that he had a claim worth presenting on theestate of Dormont.

title: Guy Mannering; or, The Astrologer - Complete
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: She married a Mr.Routledge, the son of a yeoman, and "compounded" her rights (but notthose of her issue) for a small sung of ready money, paid by old Dormont.
